definitions.example: Sure you can go across town to get that, but it'd be a schlep.

definitions.definition: A boring person, a drag; a good-for-nothing person.

definitions.example: He must have had a lot of schlep to get such good seats.
I'm exhausted after schlepping those packages around all day.

definitions.definition: To go, as on an errand; to carry out a task.
definitions.example: I schlepped down to the store for some milk.

definitions.definition: To act in a slovenly, lazy, or sloppy manner.
definitions.example: I just schlepped around the house on Sunday.
